description: A gorgeous Caribbean island nation known for its stunning beaches, lush rainforests, and the iconic Pitons – two volcanic spires.

name: São Tomé and Príncipe
description: An island nation off the western coast of Africa, known for its beautiful beaches, lush rainforests, and rich colonial history.
facts: Part of the Gulf of Guinea islands

name: Senegal
description: A West African nation known for its vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and rich history, including the famous Goree Island.
facts: Home to the Sine-Saloum Delta, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Serbia
description: A Balkan nation with a rich cultural heritage, stunning landscapes, and a vibrant capital city known for its nightlife.
facts: Home to the Đavolja Varoš, a unique natural rock formation

name: Seychelles
description: An archipelago of 115 islands in the Indian Ocean, known for its beautiful beaches, lush landscapes, and diverse marine life.
facts: Home to the Aldabra Atoll, one of the world's largest coral atolls

name: Sierra Leone
description: A West African nation known for its beautiful beaches, rich cultural heritage, and stunning natural landscapes.
facts: Home to the Outamba-Kilimi National Park, a protected rainforest

name: Singapore
description: A city-state and island nation in Southeast Asia, known for its modern skyline, efficient infrastructure, and diverse culture.
facts: One of the most densely populated countries in the world

name: Syria
description: A Middle Eastern nation with a rich cultural heritage, ancient cities, and stunning landscapes, including the famous Krak des Chevaliers castle.
facts: Home to the ancient city of Palmyra, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Somalia
description: A East African nation known for its stunning coastline, rich culture, and diverse landscapes, including the Cal Madow mountain range.
facts: Home to the Laas Geel rock art site, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Sri Lanka
description: An island nation in the Indian Ocean, known for its stunning beaches, ancient cities, rich culture, and diverse landscapes.
facts: Home to the ancient rock fortress of Sigiriya, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Swaziland/Eswatini
description: A landlocked kingdom in Southern Africa, known for its stunning landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and diverse wildlife.
facts: Home to the Hlane Royal National Park, a famous wildlife reserve

name: South Africa
description: A nation at the southern tip of Africa, known for its diverse landscapes, rich wildlife, and vibrant culture.
facts: Home to the iconic Table Mountain in Cape Town

name: South Sudan
description: A landlocked country in East-Central Africa, known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse wildlife, and stunning landscapes.
facts: Home to the Bandingilo National Park, a protected area

name: Sudan
description: A country in Northeast Africa, known for its ancient history, rich culture, and the iconic Nile River.
facts: Home to the ancient pyramids of Meroe, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Sweden
description: A Scandinavian country known for its stunning landscapes, modern cities, and high quality of life.
facts: Home to the iconic Icehotel in Jukkasjärvi

name: Switzerland
description: A mountainous country in Europe, known for its stunning Alps, pristine lakes, and vibrant cities.
facts: Home to the iconic Matterhorn mountain

name: Suriname
description: A country on the northeastern coast of South America, known for its diverse culture, lush rainforests, and stunning natural landscapes.
facts: Home to the Central Suriname Nature Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Thailand
description: A Southeast Asian country known for its stunning beaches, ancient temples, and vibrant culture.
facts: Home to the iconic Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn) in Bangkok

name: Tanzania
description: An East African country known for its stunning natural landscapes, including the iconic Serengeti National Park and Mount Kilimanjaro.
facts: Home to the Ngorongoro Conservation Area, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Tajikistan
description: A landlocked country in Central Asia, known for its stunning mountains, ancient cities, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Pamir Mountains, one of the highest mountain ranges in the world

name: East Timor
description: A Southeast Asian country known for its stunning beaches, rugged landscapes, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: One of the youngest nations in the world, gaining independence in 2002

name: Togo
description: A West African nation known for its stunning beaches, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Koutammakou, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Tonga
description: A Polynesian country in the southern Pacific Ocean, known for its stunning beaches, coral reefs, and rich culture.
facts: Home to the ancient Tonga Maritime Chiefdom

name: Trinidad and Tobago
description: A twin-island nation in the Caribbean, known for its vibrant culture, stunning beaches, and rich biodiversity.
facts: Home to the Pitch Lake, one of the world's largest natural asphalt lakes

name: Tunisia
description: A North African country known for its ancient ruins, stunning Mediterranean beaches, and vibrant culture.
facts: Home to the Amphitheater of El Jem, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Turkmenistan
description: A Central Asian country known for its ancient cities, stunning deserts, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Darvaza Gas Crater, also known as the 'Door to Hell'

name: Türkiye
description: A transcontinental country spanning Europe and Asia, known for its rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture.
facts: Home to the iconic Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque in Istanbul

name: Tuvalu
description: A Polynesian island country in the Pacific Ocean, known for its stunning atolls, crystal-clear waters, and rich marine life.
facts: One of the smallest and most remote countries in the world

name: Ukraine
description: A country in Eastern Europe, known for its rich cultural heritage, stunning architecture, and vibrant cities.
facts: Home to the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant, site of the infamous nuclear disaster

name: Uganda
description: An East African country known for its stunning landscapes, diverse wildlife, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Uruguay
description: A South American country known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and rich gaucho traditions.
facts: Home to the historic Colonia del Sacramento, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Uzbekistan
description: A Central Asian nation known for its ancient cities, stunning Islamic architecture, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the iconic Registan Square in Samarkand

name: Vanuatu
description: A Pacific island nation known for its stunning beaches, vibrant cultures, and rich biodiversity.
facts: Home to the impressive Millenium Cave, one of the largest caves in the world

name: Vatican City
description: An independent city-state surrounded by Rome, Italy, known for its rich religious history and the iconic St. Peter's Basilica.
facts: The smallest internationally recognized independent state in the world

name: Venezuela
description: A South American country known for its stunning landscapes, rich biodiversity, and vibrant cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Angel Falls, the highest uninterrupted waterfall in the world

name: Vietnam
description: A Southeast Asian country known for its stunning landscapes, rich culture, and vibrant cities.
facts: Home to the iconic Ha Long Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Yemen
description: A Middle Eastern country known for its ancient cities, stunning landscapes, and rich cultural heritage.
facts: Home to the Old City of Sana'a, a UNESCO World Heritage Site

name: Djibouti
description: A country in the Horn of Africa, known for its stunning landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and strategic location.
facts: Home to the Lac Assal, one of the hottest and most saline bodies of water in the world

name: Zambia
description: A landlocked country in Southern Africa, known for its stunning natural landscapes, rich wildlife, and vibrant culture.
facts: Home to the iconic Victoria Falls, one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World

name: Zimbabwe
description: A landlocked country in Southern Africa, known for its stunning landscapes, rich wildlife, and ancient ruins.
facts: Home to the iconic Victoria Falls, shared with Zambia
